description: A large, imposing gothic mansion on Thriller Bark where Dr. Hogback conducts his zombie research. The mansion serves as both Hogback's residence and laboratory, featuring a dining hall, guest rooms, and hidden areas for creating and storing zombies.

keyEvents.title: Arrival at Hogback's Mansion
keyEvents.description: Nami, Usopp, and Chopper reach the gates of Dr. Hogback's mansion while fleeing from the zombie horde.
keyEvents.significance: Brings the trio to the main location for the next several episodes.

keyEvents.title: Meeting Cindry at the Mansion
keyEvents.description: Victoria Cindry emerges from a well at the mansion entrance to greet the visitors.
keyEvents.significance: First introduction to the mansion's inhabitants and the presence of zombies within.

keyEvents.title: Dr. Hogback's Introduction
keyEvents.description: Dr. Hogback welcomes the Straw Hats into his mansion and introduces himself.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the mansion as Hogback's domain and research facility.

statusHistory.reason: Mansion is operational as Hogback's residence and laboratory

description: A massive graveyard on Thriller Bark filled with countless headstones and graves. Zombies rise from these graves to form platoons that attack intruders and drive them toward specific locations on the island.

keyEvents.title: Discovery of the Graveyard
keyEvents.description: Usopp, Nami, and Chopper realize they've been abandoned in a massive graveyard.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the zombie platoon attack and forces the trio toward Hogback's mansion.

keyEvents.title: Zombie Platoon Attack
keyEvents.description: Zombies rise from the graves and attack the Straw Hats in a coordinated assault.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the scale and intelligence of Moria's zombie army.

statusHistory.reason: Graveyard serves as storage and staging area for zombie army

description: A fog-shrouded, eerie forest on Thriller Bark filled with bizarre zombie creatures including talking trees, undead animals, and other grotesque beings. The forest serves as a hunting ground for zombies and a pathway to Hogback's mansion.

keyEvents.title: Journey Through the Forest
keyEvents.description: Nami, Usopp, and Chopper ride through the forest in Hildon's carriage, spotting various zombie creatures.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the unsettling atmosphere of Thriller Bark and introduces the zombie threat.

keyEvents.title: Zombie Animals Spotted
keyEvents.description: Various zombie creatures including MocDonald and Unigaro are seen in the forest.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the variety and spread of Gecko Moria's zombie army.

statusHistory.reason: Forest is inhabited by wild zombies

name.japanese: スリラーバークの海岸

description: The coastal area of Thriller Bark where ships dock and become trapped. A giant spiderweb exists in this area that ensnares vessels attempting to approach or leave the island.

keyEvents.title: Thousand Sunny Caught in Spiderweb
keyEvents.description: The Thousand Sunny drifts toward Thriller Bark and becomes entangled in a massive spiderweb, trapping the ship.
keyEvents.significance: Prevents the crew's escape and forces them to confront Thriller Bark's dangers.

statusHistory.reason: Coast serves as trap for incoming ships
